akn:section.akn:heading: Establishment of U.S. Customs and Border Protection; Commissioner, Deputy Commissioner, and operatio

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general There is established in the Department an agency to be known as U.S. Customs and Border Protection.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Commissioner of U.S. Customs and Border Protection

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Commissioner of U.S. Customs and Border Protection
(d) Deputy Commissioner There shall be in U.S. Customs and Border Protection a Deputy Commissioner who shall assist the Commissioner in the management of U.S. Customs and Border Protection.
